name: Baldi's basics courses Plus
description:
Baldi's Basics Plus is a game made by Basically games. All credits to him.

This is my first (working) fangame that I made in just 4 days. Due to the amount of time that the game was made, you might encounter some bugs.
Please report bugs if you find them!

This fangame is also inspired by Baldi's Basics in Minigames! by Baldiisagoodperson.

Made by DOI MODDER
